        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 777x54
          text run at (0,0) width 606: "CELLPADDING controls the padding in pixels between the border of each cells and the cell's "
          text run at (605,0) width 172: "contents.The first table has"
          text run at (0,18) width 383: "a cellpadding of 8 pixels. The second table is not using cell "
          text run at (382,18) width 386: "padding. Notice the difference. There should be a larger gap"
          text run at (0,36) width 203: "between the cell border and it's "
          text run at (202,36) width 167: "contents in the first table. "
